en.name: Everything You Need to Know About Noaat App's New Features
en.description: Discover all the new features in Noaat app: Arabic interface, dark mode, cashback tracking, and more. Complete guide to an exceptional user experience.
en.content:
Introduction: The New Noaat App - A Completely Different Experience

When you download the Noaat app for the first time, you'll find that it's not like other apps. We've created something special for Egyptian users, with a complete Arabic interface and an easy user experience that makes you feel like you're using an app made just for you.

First Time Opening the App: Easy Start

As soon as you download the app, you'll find beautiful welcome screens that explain exactly how to use Noaat:

  • Simple illustrated explanation: Beautiful graphics that help you understand the system without complications
  • Clear steps: Each step explained in Arabic and in an understandable way
  • Quick registration: Create an account in just a few minutes

Arabic Interface: Feels Authentically Egyptian

You won't feel like you're dealing with a translated app. The entire app is:

  • Written in Arabic from the ground up
  • Colors and design suit our taste
  • Menus and buttons are all in their right places
  • Easy navigation between pages

Dark and Light Mode: Choose What Comforts You

You can choose between two modes according to your comfort:

  • Light Mode: For daytime use or bright places
  • Dark Mode: Easy on the eyes at night and saves phone battery

Restaurant Screen: Everything You Need in One Place

You'll find a list of all partner restaurants with important details:

  • Restaurant name and food type
  • Cashback percentage you'll receive
  • Currently available offers
  • User ratings and reviews
  • Restaurant location on the map

Receipt Upload: Simple and Fast Process

The most important thing in the app is uploading receipts, and we've made this very easy:

  1. Press the upload receipt button
  2. Photo the receipt with your phone camera
  3. Wait seconds for the app to read it
  4. Get confirmation that the receipt was accepted
  5. Cashback enters your wallet in minutes

Digital Wallet: Your Money is Safe and Tracked

Inside the app, there's a digital wallet where you can:

  • See your current cashback balance
  • Track history of all transactions
  • View receipts you've uploaded
  • Request money withdrawal or use it to buy coupons

Smart Notifications: Don't Miss Any Offer

The app sends you useful notifications about:

  • New offers at restaurants near you
  • When new cashback enters your account
  • Available coupons with high discounts
  • New restaurants that joined the network

Settings and Privacy: Everything Under Your Control

In the settings section you can:

  • Change language (Arabic/English)
  • Control notifications
  • View privacy policy
  • Contact customer service
  • Manage your account information

Why is Noaat App Different from Other Apps?

๐ Exclusive Features in Noaat

  • Review Speed: Your receipts are reviewed in minutes, not hours
  • Complete Transparency: Know exactly how much you'll get and when
  • High Security: Your data is protected with the highest security standards
  • Egyptian Technical Support: Support team that speaks Arabic and understands your needs

How to Get the Best Experience with the App?

To benefit more from the app, follow these tips:

  1. Enable Notifications: So you don't miss any new offers
  2. Connect Your Location: So we can find restaurants near you
  3. Upload Your Receipts Immediately: Don't let receipts accumulate
  4. Track Your Balance: Check every few days to see how much your balance reached
  5. Use Offers: Look for coupons and special offers

The Future: What's Coming in Upcoming Updates?

We're not stopping here. Some nice updates are coming soon:

  • More restaurants and new partnerships
  • Additional features in the digital wallet
  • Exclusive offers for app users
  • Improvements in response speed
